AnimationState.Script: Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev ~= "STATE_Rubble" and Prev ~= "TRANS_IntoRubble" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IntoRubble") end

Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev ~= "STATE_Rubble" and Prev ~= "TRANS_ReallyDamagedToRubble" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_ReallyDamagedToRubble") end;
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev ~= "STATE_Rubble" and Prev ~= "TRANS_IntoRubble" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IntoRubble") end
